descriptions:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush, Black (HX3681/24)

Get a deeper clean with Sonicare technology—removes up to 3x more plaque than a manual brush. Features a built-in pressure sensor that flashes red to help protect gums, plus two intensity settings for a comfortable clean. The QuadPacer guides you through each quadrant, and the SmarTimer signals when your 2 minutes are up. Slim, ergonomic handle with a familiar brush head shape for easy use. Includes: 1 Sonicare 4100 handle, 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head, and 1 USB charger (no wall adapter).

Title: Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,

Description: Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24

Remove plaque and experience a deep, effective clean with Sonicare technology, removing up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush. Sonicare technology gently pulses water between your teeth, for a month's worth of manual brushing in just 2 minutes. The QuadPacer lets you know when you've spent the optimal amount of time on each section of your mouth while the SmarTimer signals when your 2 minutes is up. The pressure sensor flashes red to remind you to ease off, helping to prevent gum recession, while the 2 intensity settings ensure a comfortable clean that’s right for you. Its slim ergonomic design and familiar-shaped head gives you everything you need for an effective clean. The kit includes 1 Philips Sonicare 3100 electric toothbrush, 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head and 1 USB charger (wall adaptor not included). 1 Philips Sonicare 3100 electric toothbrush, 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head, 1 USB charger
